templates.title: Dockpeek
templates.name: dockpeek
templates.description: A lightweight, self-hosted Docker dashboard that provides quick access to all running containers and their exposed ports with one-click access to web apps.

env.name: SECRET_KEY
env.label: SECRET_KEY
env.description: Secret key for the application. Change this for security.

env.name: USERNAME
env.label: USERNAME
env.description: Username for authentication. Change this from default.

env.name: PASSWORD
env.label: PASSWORD
env.description: Password for authentication. Change this from default.
